page: AG60168: Processing Of Horticultural And Plantation Crops

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Principles and techniques in preservation of foods and vegetables-cold storage, freezing, addition of chemicals, dehydration and canning, packaging. Manufacturing methods of major horticultural and plantation crop productsjuices, pickles, jams, jellies, marmalades,tea,coffee-processing and quality control.
